com.qtplaf.library.ai.neural

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.ai.neural.Network

  • public class Network
extends java.lang.Object
    Feedforward neural network.

    All weights and related matrices are [rows=output, columns=input].

    This network version does not accept context layers.

    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Network.Backward
      Data generated during the back propagation.
      static class  Network.Forward
      Data generated when the network processes inputs in a feed forward, composed of: Signals or weighted sums of inputs.

        public static void setFlatSpot(double flatSpot)
        Set the flat spot to avoid near zero derivatives.

      • backward

        public static void backward(Network network,
                            Network.Forward forward,
                            Network.Backward backward,
                            double[] networkDeltas)
        Backward process of the network deltas or errors and produce the backward data, cumulating gradients.
        Parameters:
        network - The network.
        forward - The forward data generated in the forward process.
        backward - The backward data (gradients are cumulated)
        networkDeltas - The network deltas or errors.

      • forward

        public static Network.Forward forward(Network network,
                                      double[] networkInputs)
        Process the inputs and store the outputs.
        Parameters:
        network - The network.
        networkInputs - The inputs to process.
        Returns:
        The forward data.

      • createStructure

        public void createStructure(int... sizes)
        Creates an empty structure nwith the argument list of layer sizes. Weights and biases are left to zero, and activations are null. This method is intended for IO purposes to initialize the structure to later be filled with raw data.

        This version creates only neurons of types Input, Hidden and Output.

        Parameters:
        sizes - The list of layer sizes.

      • addInputLayer

        public void addInputLayer(int neurons)
        Add the input layer.
        Parameters:
        neurons - The number of neurons.

      • addHiddenLayer

        public void addHiddenLayer(int neurons,
                           Activation activation,
                           double bias)
        Add a hidden layer with the given number of neurons, the same activation function for each neuron, and the same bias for each neuron. The output layer is the last layer added.
        Parameters:
        neurons - The number of neurons.
        activation - The activation function.
        bias - The bias.

      • addOutputLayer

        public void addOutputLayer(int neurons,
                           Activation activation,
                           double bias)
        Add the output layer with the given number of neurons, the same activation function for each neuron, and the same bias for each neuron. The output layer is the last layer added.
        Parameters:
        neurons - The number of neurons.
        activation - The activation function.
        bias - The bias.
